T:RuFramework.IProgressCallback
member.summary: This defines an interface which can be implemented by UI elements which indicate the progress of a long operation. (See ProgressWindow for a typical implementation)

member.name: M:RuFramework.IProgressCallback.Begin(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Call this method from the worker thread to initialize the progress callback.
member.param: The minimum value in the progress range (e.g. 0)
The maximum value in the progress range (e.g. 100)

member.name: M:RuFramework.IProgressCallback.Begin
member.summary: Call this method from the worker thread to initialize the progress callback, without setting the range

member.name: M:RuFramework.IProgressCallback.SetRange(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Call this method from the worker thread to reset the range in the progress callback
member.param: The minimum value in the progress range (e.g. 0)
The maximum value in the progress range (e.g. 100)
member.remarks: You must have called one of the Begin() methods prior to this call.

member.name: M:RuFramework.IProgressCallback.SetText(System.String)
member.summary: Call this method from the worker thread to update the progress text.
member.param: The progress text to display
member.remarks: You must have called one of the Begin() methods prior to this call.

member.name: M:RuFramework.IProgressCallback.StepTo(System.Int32)
member.summary: Call this method from the worker thread to increase the progress counter by a specified value.
member.param: The amount by which to increment the progress indicator
member.remarks: You must have called one of the Begin() methods prior to this call.

member.name: M:RuFramework.IProgressCallback.Increment(System.Int32)
member.summary: Call this method from the worker thread to step the progress meter to a particular value.
member.param: The value to which to step the meter
member.remarks: You must have called one of the Begin() methods prior to this call.

member.name: P:RuFramework.IProgressCallback.IsAborting
member.summary: If this property is true, then you should abort work
member.remarks: You must have called one of the Begin() methods prior to this call.

member.name: M:RuFramework.IProgressCallback.End
member.summary: Call this method from the worker thread to finalize the progress meter
member.remarks: You must have called one of the Begin() methods prior to this call.
